Comment: Only time will tell how Carney did yesterday, and we'll know by the state of Canada's well-being,  not these "shoot from the hip" talking heads. I'm too far left to have voted for Mr.Carney, but one thing is for sure, Canada is hemorrhaging auto sector jobs and the US president threatens Canadian sovereignty on nearly a daily basis. If either of these things improve, then I'll concede he's doing a good job, but I'm not convinced thus far
Author: gorillasuitriot
